channel.title: Bison on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Bison on Arrans github.io

item.title: Genivia/RE-flex
item.description: Yet another high-performance C++ regex library and lexical analyzer generator like Flex: extends Flex++ with Unicode support, indent/dedent anchors, lazy quantifiers, functions for lex and syntax error reporting and more. Seamlessly integrates with Bison and other parsers.
